name: ps5_scraper
description: To compile code into build tsc

scripts.deploy_disc: npm run build && cd build && gcloud functions deploy runDiscBot --trigger-topic scrapr --runtime nodejs10 --env-vars-file .env.yaml
scripts.deploy_digital: npm run build && cd build && gcloud functions deploy runDigitalBot --trigger-topic scrapr --runtime nodejs10 --env-vars-file .env.yaml

author: Shan Islam
